price: (8) [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,[1288]
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
